title: RIFT RACER Contest - Live now!
body:
Hey Summoners! 

Happy L10, and thank you for coming to celebrate with us - here is everything you need to know about Rift Racer:

The objective of the game is to destroy the nexus in the fastest time possible! Assemble your team, theory-craft the perfect champions and and run it down a lane to destroy the nexus as quickly as possible! You have until 11:59 pm AEDT tonight!  

Riot Games Oceania has set the bar at 4:20 https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/257443774/200066492?tab=overview

How to participate from home!
* Create a custom game (Map Type: Summoners Rift, Game Type: Blind Pick)
* Pick your team comp
* Destroy the Nexus!
* After the game go to your match history
* Find your custom game
* Click on â€˜View On Webâ€™
* Copy the URL and submit to the form in this post in the format of **IGN: [Link]**

**Prizing?**
At the end of the day, the team posting the quickest run will win 5,000 RP per player (25,000 RP total for the team), second place wins 3,000 RP per player (15,000 RP total for the team), and third place wins 1,000 RP per player (5,000 RP total for the team).

https://forms.gle/eXFC6M5rfcuf96Pu6

replies.body:
Winning teams have been determined!

First place goes to two teams who managed to take down the nexus within the same second. For prizing, we've combined first and second place and split it equally among the 10 players of each team, granting them 4K RP each.

https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/259185115/201645071?tab=overview
https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/259156226/200066214?tab=overview

Third place goes to this team who were only 1 second behind! Players on this team have earned 1K RP each.

https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/259175894/201963485?tab=overview

Thank you to everyone who participated, we hope you had as much fun yesterday as we did. The celebrations continue with 10 days of gifts for all players who had accounts before the Riot Pls stream started yesterday, [check out the details here](https://www.riotgames.com/en/news/riot-pls-anniversary-edition-recap).
GGs to the other first place team! Was wondering what your strat was? We didn't have human feeders and had to experiment a lot and ended up doing a rush down not lane. :D
Hey man i've sent you a friend request, were curios what your strat was. dr mundo? why

So right after the whole dilemma with having only bot players and no real players, the team that comes tied first gets to have 4 players that feed constantly??? I thought it was made very clear that it was only bots in the game and not real players, very disappointed with the turnout of this event.
Yeah it makes no sense, I feel the rules were not laid out properly on the post. Not very happy at the poor planning.
Totally agree, we were also under the impression that it was only bots, not real players. Very unfortunate outcome, especially with it being the 10th anniversary for League of Legends.

theres a link to a ticket i sent to them with regards to rules. the topic was "rift racer" yet they confused what i meant with a normals game. I'm greatful for winning. but i feel as though other team missed out unfairly due to rules which werent so apparentl
https://gyazo.com/8f50f9a25d81129866cdd491fd7cf0bb

The celebrations continue with 10 days of gifts for all players who had accounts before the Riot Pls stream started yesterday, [check out the details here](https://www.riotgames.com/en/news/riot-pls-anniversary-edition-recap).

I'm disappointed with how poorly organised this competition was. Lack of communication on Riot's part lead to some entering teams not having the advantage of having player feeders on the opposing side.

> [{quoted}](name=Indy Savvy,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=v02mAZr5,comment-id=00240002,timestamp=2019-10-17T13:52:30.952+0000)
>
> I'm disappointed with how poorly organised this competition was. Lack of communication on Riot's part lead to some entering teams not having the advantage of having player feeders on the opposing side.

3:58 was the winning score?? Would have to agree with Indy Savvy on this one. Looking at those match histories, theres heaps of improvements that could be made. Here's a couple of simple ones:

1) 5 feeders on enemy team, not 4
2) LULU
3) Some enemy team members (take smite!?) could be farming (after initial int) to buy speed items to get to lane faster, also could be farming to provide shutdown gold.
Just curious, i've just checked and i dont have black alistar? and its also removed fromthe post. was this a mistake?

{{champion:32}}

Hey guys, we hit 3:58!  https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/259156226/200066214?tab=overview
This is our submission at 11:53pm, but our submission didn't have an IGN in front of it. We submitted another at 12:01am with the IGN "Gnocchi"! 

This is our end game screen: https://gyazo.com/88a42add3c00c5f83b867aa5147536b7
And our match history (exact same link as above): https://gyazo.com/099af2642419a0c5b6d38e4ca56bf00e

Hope being 2 minutes is okay with you! We tried our hearts out for this ðŸ˜­

**I edited this post to include the time we submitted the initial google form
great job, definitely deserve the win. did you submit in the google form before midnight?
Yeah we submitted around 11:53pm! It's just that the submission was without an IGN. By the time we realised, it was 12:01am and we submitted another with the IGN this time around.
Bad luck should have read the rules :))

Hey Smoothie, I don't feel as if it's fair that you've said that people aren't allowed to have enemies, and then rectified that. A team of 10 can easily run it down the lane towards a single person, give them a Pentakill's worth of gold, and then they'd steam roll an amazingly good time compared to a team of 5 playing fairly. This is just unachievable for a group of only 5, and the time would be smashed by a Tristana that has 5 (or more) kills worth of gold along with 2 and a half completed items.

Hi Pudding,

Apologies for the miscommunication on my end here, we were running the in-house games as no bots, and just 5s on one team, and I was later told this was not the case for the online tournament specifically. I forgot to rectify my answer to the other player I told this to.

You are allowed to play with bots on the enemy and allied team!

Kindest,
Smoothie

can you have human players on the enemy team?

for example 5 humans vs 5 humans
Does everyone who get past 4:20 get the rp? or is the fastest time overall
So what did everyone get? and do we know the results yet?
4:02, anyone faster?{{summoner:4}}

~~No bots, no enemies! Just 5 on one side and then push as fast as you can!!!~~

Just editing my post here, you can have bots on the enemy and ally teams!

Kindest,
Smoothie
Are we allowed enemies on the other team like players?

Hey Ayuumi,

You can, but I don't think that would make for a very fast nexus explosion!

Kindest,
Smoothie

hey there this would be speeding up the run alot as u can get lethal tempo also u are stay some very differnt answer to people one person u said no bots now ur saying bots also are we aloud real players on the enemy team??

Hey Im T0xic,

Please see my answer re: this to Pudding: 

> Hi Pudding,

> Apologies for the miscommunication on my end here, we were running the in-house games as no bots, and just 5s on one team, and I was later told this was not the case for the online tournament specifically. I forgot to rectify my answer to the other player I told this to. You are allowed to play with bots on the enemy and allied team!

Kindest,
Smoothie
You are only allowed 5 players total though correct? Players, not bots.
Hey, my group's had some theory crafting going on and we were wondering if we could include a bot in the run?

Smoothie, one of the things that still doesn't make sense in your responses to comments is the question: Can enemy players (as in other real life people) be on the enemy team. They could run down the lane, you tag them once and they die to turret - you get the gold. This would give people a very unfair advantage if they use this strat and others are 5v0.

I am not asking about bots.
Hey, is there any way we could see what the leader board is/currently looking like?  Really hard to keep going for lower time/change ideas since we dont know whats to beat
tristana is cheating she started with a dagger and long sword at 0:09

Please Tell us
are we allowed to upload more than one time if we beat our previous time?

We found out that when we destroy the nexus for eg. at 4:25, the time we receive in the end added an extra 5 seconds because the nexus takes 5 seconds for it to explode. 
Does the extra 5 second count as the final time?
